description: Needs to deck out your bathroom with some undersea world decor, please try this undersea shower curtain for your bathroom.

This ocean animal shower curtain measures 72" x 72" and features 12 plastic rings. It is made with polyester construction to reduce fading and to shed water. This fish bath curtain is sure to make a great addition to your bathroom!
Features a colorful undersea world decor Measures 72"W x 72"L 12 button holes for hook placement Includes 12 plastic shower curtian hooks Machine washable Printed on 100% polyester
Dry clean or wash separately in cold water. Do not use chlorine bleach.
1 x UNDERSEA SHOWER CURTAIN+ 12 SHOWER CURTAIN HOOKS

Due to the unique handmade nature, slight dimension variation should be acceptable. And actual color may slightly vary due to the nature of photographing and different monitor settings. The curtain arrives folded, so you need to get the creases out. Putting it in the dryer under the lowest setting worked. Picked that and put the iron heat from medium to low. 25 minutes later it was good to go
